authority: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
parkingRates: Official on-airport rates: $18/day (long-term), $39/day (short-term garage). Off-site lots typically $8-$18/day.
shuttleInfo: Most off-site lots run free shuttles every 5-15 minutes, 24/7. AirTrain connects all terminals.
distanceFromCity: 15 miles southeast of Midtown Manhattan, roughly 45-75 min by car depending on traffic
